about_the_game:
Stay Alive is a single-player third-person story-driven survival horror game. Step into the shoes of Lt Bishop Coleman and Keisha Hampton, a rookie cop, as they investigate the mystery of the outbreak of a deadly infection in Paradise city that turns its unfortunate host into blood-thirsty zombie. Play through two different storylines, the first more horror oriented while the second leans toward survival. Battle through mutated monstrous creatures spread across the city. Manage your ammo and inventory and build your arsenal of weapons to fight against your threats. Do your best to escape and stay alive!

  • Begin the first chapter in the Stay Alive series as you delve deeper in the tormented history of the city and learn of the evil that encompass Paradise city.
  • Narrative-driven, third-person survival horror experience
  • Solve treacherous and deadly puzzles to discover the mysterious source behind the deadly infection plaguing of Paradise

short_description: Narrative-driven, third-person survival horror game where you fight through the zombie infested city of Paradise. Solve puzzles, collection items and manage your inventory while to survive. Play through two full storylines of two protagonist each with unique styles of gameplay and obstacles.
